title: Design & Configure AKS Network Topology
description: Define Virtual Network, Subnets, CNI networking configuration, and Network Security Groups (NSGs) in Terraform.
acceptance_criteria: VNet address space defined; Subnets allocated; Terraform plan validates
definition_of_done: Terraform applied in Dev; Network connectivity verified

title: Implement AKS Cluster Terraform Module
description: Write Terraform code for AKS cluster with System Assigned Managed Identity, RBAC, and Auto-scaling node pools.
acceptance_criteria: Cluster version pinned; Auto-scaling enabled; OIDC Issuer URL enabled
definition_of_done: Cluster accessible via kubectl; Nodes reporting ready

title: Azure AD B2C Policy Prototype
description: Develop and test custom policies (XML) or user flows to include custom claims (roles) in the JWT.
acceptance_criteria: JWT contains extension_role claim; Token signature valid
definition_of_done: Prototype validating custom claims via jwt.ms
deployment_notes: Upload policies to B2C Identity Experience Framework
business_value: Enables RBAC for secure API access

title: Provision PostgreSQL Flexible Server with PostGIS
description: Configure Azure Database for PostgreSQL with High Availability, Geo-Redundancy, and PostGIS extension.
acceptance_criteria: Postgres 16+ provisioned; PostGIS active; Geo-redundancy enabled
definition_of_done: Connection verified from temporary Bastion host

title: Define WatermelonDB Schema & Sync Strategy
description: Design local database schema and conflict resolution strategy for offline sync.
acceptance_criteria: Schema covers Products/Requests; Sync protocol defined; Conflict strategy documented
definition_of_done: Architecture document approved by Tech Lead

title: Implement NestJS Auth Guard & RBAC Decorators
description: Create a reusable Auth library for NestJS services that validates JWTs and checks roles.
acceptance_criteria: Guard validates token signature; Decorator restricts access; 401/403 returns
definition_of_done: Library published to private registry; Unit tests passing

title: Create Reusable GitHub Actions Workflow Templates
description: Develop composite actions for Build, Test, Scan, and Deploy to be used across all microservices.
acceptance_criteria: Workflows standardized; Docker caching implemented; Secrets handling secure
definition_of_done: Workflow successfully runs on sample repo

title: Integrate Mapbox GL JS & Drawing Tools
description: Implement React component for map rendering and polygon drawing.
acceptance_criteria: Map renders; Polygon drawing tools work; GeoJSON export works

title: Implement Streaming CSV Parser Worker
description: Create NestJS worker to consume upload events, stream CSV from Blob Storage, validate, and batch insert.
acceptance_criteria: Memory usage constant; Batch size configurable; Validation errors logged
definition_of_done: Unit tests pass with large CSV mock

title: Implement Helm Charts for Microservices
description: Create a base Helm chart with sub-charts for backend services, defining deployments, services, ingress, and HPA.
acceptance_criteria: Values.yaml configurable; Ingress SSL configured; HPA exposed

title: PostGIS Query Performance Benchmarking
description: Create synthetic dataset and benchmark ST_Contains/ST_Distance queries to validate routing feasibility.
acceptance_criteria: Benchmarks run; Indexes optimized; Query time < 100ms

title: Implement Sync Engine Adapter
description: Build the sync adapter connecting WatermelonDB to backend REST endpoints.
acceptance_criteria: Incremental pull works; Batch push works; Auth refresh handled
definition_of_done: Integration test passing with backend mock

title: Implement Routing Service Logic
description: Develop NestJS service to handle routing logic: Geo-match -> Brand-match -> Round-Robin.
acceptance_criteria: Routing returns correct center; Round-robin persisted; Fallback logic works

title: Implement WebSocket Gateway (Backend)
description: Set up NestJS Gateway with Redis adapter for scalable location broadcasting.
acceptance_criteria: Auth handshake secure; Redis Pub/Sub working; Scales to 10k connections

title: Implement Background Geolocation Service (Mobile)
description: Configure native modules for background location tracking on iOS/Android.
acceptance_criteria: Tracking works in background; Battery drain < 5%/hr; Permissions handled
deployment_notes: Requires App Store background location justification

title: Validation Logic & Error Reporting
description: Implement business rule validation for imports and generate error CSVs for failed rows.
acceptance_criteria: Rules applied per row; Error CSV generated; Notification sent
